p: We've sent the claim reference number to the person or company who can confirm your support costs. You can
linkText: see the progress of your claim in your claims history

whatNext.p1: We'll let you know when the person or company confirms your claim and sends the claim to us. If we approve the claim, we'll pay the money into the bank account you chose.
whatNext.p2: If the person or company does not confirm your claim or we do not approve it, we'll let you know what to do next.

feedback.link: What did you think of this service?
